languages.text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть улыбается.{/n} "Твоя {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}смелость{/d} прославила тебя намного больше, чем, вероятно, ты сам{mf||а} представляешь. Истинные подвиги навсегда остаются в летописи Империума и делают честь родословной фон Валанциус".

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть улыбается.{/n} "Твоя {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}смелость{/d} прославила тебя намного больше, чем, вероятно, ты сам{mf||а} представляешь. Истинные подвиги навсегда остаются в летописи Империума и делают честь родословной фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your courage has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your courage has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your courage has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your courage has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

languages.text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉微微一笑。{/n}“或许你没有意识到，你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}勇武{/d}早已广为流传。你真正的英雄事迹将永载帝国史册，为冯·瓦兰修斯家族带来荣誉。”
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉微微一笑。{/n}“或许你没有意识到，你的英勇之名早已广为流传。你真正的英雄事迹将永载帝国史册，为冯·瓦兰修斯家族带来荣誉。”

languages.text: «Además...». {n}Theodora sonríe.{/n} «Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}valor{/d} te ha traído más fama de lo que crees. Las verdaderas heroicidades pasarán a los anales del Imperium y honrarán al linaje von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: «Además...». {n}Theodora sonríe.{/n} «Tu valor te ha traído más fama de lo que crees. Las verdaderas heroicidades pasarán a los anales del Imperium y honrarán al linaje von Valancius».

languages.text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}勇気{/d}は、己が思っている以上に有名なものとなった。真の英雄的功績は、帝国の歴史に永遠に語り継がれ、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血脈に名誉をもたらすだろう」
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「お前の勇気は、己が思っている以上に有名なものとなった。真の英雄的功績は、帝国の歴史に永遠に語り継がれ、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血脈に名誉をもたらすだろう」
「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}勇気{/d}は、己が思っている以上に有名なものとなった。真の英雄的功績は、帝国の歴史に永遠に語り継がれ、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血脈に名誉をもたらすだろう」

languages.text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora avec un léger sourire,{/n} Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} vous a {mf|rendu|rendue} bien plus célèbre que vous semblez l'imaginer. En plus de couvrir la lignée des von Valancius de gloire, vos actes d'héroïsme resteront à jamais dans les annales de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora avec un léger sourire,{/n} Votre courage vous a {mf|rendu|rendue} bien plus célèbre que vous semblez l'imaginer. En plus de couvrir la lignée des von Valancius de gloire, vos actes d'héroïsme resteront à jamais dans les annales de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora lächelt schwach,{/n} "hat Euer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}Mut{/d} Euch viel berühmter gemacht, als es Euch selbst vermutlich bewusst ist. Wahre Heldentaten werden in den Annalen des Imperiums ewig weiterleben und der Familie derer von Valancius Ehre einbringen."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora lächelt schwach,{/n} "hat Euer Mut Euch viel berühmter gemacht, als es Euch selbst vermutlich bewusst ist. Wahre Heldentaten werden in den Annalen des Imperiums ewig weiterleben und der Familie derer von Valancius Ehre einbringen."

languages.text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}Cesaretin{/d} seni muhtemelen fark ettiğinden daha meşhur yaptı. Yaptığın gerçek kahramanlıklar, İmparatorluk'un tarih kitaplarında sonsuza dek yaşayacak ve von Valancius soyuna şeref getirecek."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}courage{/d} has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Cesaretin seni muhtemelen fark ettiğinden daha meşhur yaptı. Yaptığın gerçek kahramanlıklar, İmparatorluk'un tarih kitaplarında sonsuza dek yaşayacak ve von Valancius soyuna şeref getirecek."

languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora smiles slightly.{/n} "Your courage has made you far more famous than you yourself probably realise. True feats of heroism will forever live on in the annals of the Imperium and bring honour to the von Valancius line."
